lead_paragraph: “The industry and market headwinds against us have been strong, and the timing for success in our positions too unpredictable,” Richard C. Perry said.

headline.print_headline: Perry Capital Fund Closing as Clients Flee
headline.main: Perry Closes Flagship Fund as Clients Flee After Losses

snippet: “The industry and market headwinds against us have been strong, and the timing for success in our positions too unpredictable,” Richard C. Perry said....
abstract: Richard C Perry says he is closing his flagship fund Perry Capital, latest hedge fund to throw in towel due to lackluster returns and heavy losses; firm lost more than 12 percent of investor money in 2015 and is already down 2.5 percent this year.
